data.message: Facebook, how do I do my own "year in review "..? I know typically you post a link to do them every year...

replies.message: Hi Casey. We'll be launching a personal Year in Review soon where you can see and share highlights from your year. Stay tuned! -Rey
Facebook i want to verify my page

Hi there, Ahmad. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1UzYnUC. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1NTwt51. Thanks. -Jordan
Facebook  I need your help with an account of mine...  Can you please acknowledge me and be willing to help me please?
Facebook , I am sad that 'year in review' is not video format this year. My heartiest request would be to make it video for 2016. Thanks and you guys rock :)
Facebook when I posted my year in review post no one else can see it. Why is that? And it wouldn't save my edits.
Facebook, your list of pictures is lame. Why bother?
This year's year in review is a huge let down. I can't even select my own pictures. It's not a video it's totally boring.
Your Year In Review Stinks We Cant Pick Our Own Pics Not Happy With It
Ok let me rephrase for the ones who may not have more than 15 pictures, I'd like to edit and select from all of my pictures please.
I agree that its boring this year.... But I was just replying to the other guys comment that it does in fact let you pick from all of your pictures. It let me.
